reviewText: I loved that show when I was a little girl. I want my children to learn spanish and I believe that if they watch enough tv in spanish that will help. And it is an innocent show like few nowadays.
This movie brought me back to my childhood days. I loved it! Amazon shipped it right away and item came in excellent condition! Now I get to show my children this timeless classic. Thank You!

As we all are use to from amazon, the item arrive on time. Topo gigio is my all  time favorate kid tv series the video is not remastered  so the quality is not the best, Hey! is from the 70's. The reason only 3 stars is because the case  say that is 3 volumes but only 2 were in it  and no, there is no disc with side A ane sideB on it  :(
